name: BND_EPSD_HX
description: This table contains the history of various changes made to bundled episodes.

columns.name: EPISODE_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the bundled episode record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: HX_UPDATE_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time at which the bundled episode was changed.

columns.name: HX_USER_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the user who performed the changes to the bundled episode.

columns.name: HX_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: HX_COVERAGE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the coverage that will be billed for the bundled episode.

columns.name: HX_PAYOR_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the payer responsible for the bundled episode's expected payment.

columns.name: HX_SELFPAY_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether the guarantor is responsible for the bundled episode's expected payment.

columns.name: HX_BPC_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the bundled episode terms associated with the bundled episode. The terms are used to define various reimbursement related attributes for a bundled episode.

columns.name: HX_BPC_ID_BPC_NAME
columns.description: The name of the bundled episode terms record.

columns.name: HX_BPC_CSN
columns.description: The contact serial number of the bundled episode terms associated with the bundled episode. The terms are used to define various reimbursement related attributes for a bundled episode.

columns.name: HX_BILLING_START_DT
columns.description: The start date from which the services are covered in the bundled episode.

columns.name: HX_BILLING_END_DT
columns.description: The end date until which the services are covered in the bundled episode.

columns.name: HX_EXP_TOT_PMT
columns.description: The amount of the total expected payment from the responsible party of a bundled episode.

columns.name: HX_EXP_HOSP_PMT
columns.description: The amount of the total hospital expected payment from the responsible party of a bundled episode.

columns.name: HX_EXP_PROF_PMT
columns.description: The amount of the total professional expected payment from the responsible party of a bundled episode. This will only be used when a separate  professional payment is expected.

columns.name: HX_AUTO_CHG_YN
columns.description: Set to yes if this bundled episode update was done via a background system update.
